2_1PTaJe3LLeB5Pfxq8KjcpQSPcSK1PQqsQs.body: to mute a modafucka you can just click on the tree very small dots, on the right top side of each answer... click it, and click mute.. then on the top right you see a notification... you can hit mute.. to don't see their messages again.

> [tun](#comment_3_1FxpcMsoTKTeUoNDRJKzqyLAwXuwVg3zgX): How do you setup a blacklist?

to mute a modafucka you can just click on the tree very small dots, on the right top side of each answer... click it, and click mute.. then on the top right you see a notification... you can hit mute.. to don't see their messages again.
